*The knife hit Drazom's back. He didn't scream or anything. It was already =
snowing which made him even colder. Mech fluid begins pouring out of his ba=
ck* Drazom:............ *Drazom's head hits the ground. It wasn't really th=
e knife. It was coldness. Drazom's spark fades out and he lies there......a=
nd mutters one word..* Drazom:....Mantella....... *Drazom's optics flicker =
and fade out* *He lived to love....he lived to die.....That was a queston t=
hat would never be answered*





(OOC: Please Drazom on the Deceased bots =
page. as that he died from the lack of emch fluid and because of how cold i=
t was)
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
  Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 6:54 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast War=
s


  The Radicons had walked off and left Drazom, but now they were walkin=
g back and they seen him again. Airbomber laughed.

  "There's the guy I sa=
ved, I wonder why he wants to die?" Airbomber asked.

  "I don't know, but =
I will oblige his needs!" Stranato said. Stranato walked up behind Drazom s=
lowly. Stranato pulled out a knife, something he had stolen from the People=
's Base, and plunged it down, the knife screaming toward Drazom's back.

  =
Stronghold and Blender took a sip of their beer.

  "Why does that guy want=
 to die, though?" Arrow asked.

  "Some bots are crazy." Train Wreck said, =
the 5 Radicons watching Stranato...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    F=
rom: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, June=
 28, 2000 7:01 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Drazom slowly turn=
s his head and looks at The Radicons* Drazom:....no......I must...die for..=
...my stupidity...of....messing up with......Mantella..... *Drazom's optics=
 widen as he remembers something* Drazom:...hey....I'm a Pred.....I AM!....=
.kill me........*Drazom pulls hisself up by a tree limb and mech fluid pour=
s out of his side and he falls back to the ground shivering from how cold i=
t is getting from the lack of mech fluid*
      ----- Original Message ----=
- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, =
June 27, 2000 10:59 PM
      Subject: Neo Beast Wars


      Train Wreck wa=
lked away from the battle, Plintissa and Stronghold run away. Stranato, not=
 seeing any point in continuing the battle, ran off with them. Scamrock fol=
lowed with a grunt from being outnumbered. Artist laughed and ran after the=
m as well.

      "Know what my names gonna be now? I'm going to be Blender=
!" Scamrock said.

      "Who cares about you?" Stranato asked. Stronghold =
reached out to grab Stranato but he cartwheeled out of the way.

      "We =
left that idiot Arrow in your CR Chamber, Plintissa." Stronghold said.

   =
   "WHAT!?" Stranato yelled.

      "It's my base, and Arrow is welcome to =
be repaired there and so are the other former Radicons!" Plintissa yelled.
=

      The Radicons nodded and walked on, Stranato grumbled out something t=
hat none of them, could understand. Airbomber seen them and waved to them. =
The People's Base's secret passageway was in the nearby swamp.

      "Get =
ready!" Train Wreck said to Airbomber.

      "What about this guy?" Airbom=
ber asked.

      "Never mind him." Train Wreck said. Airbomber drug Drazom=
 out of the water and ushered him to come along while he walked with his co=
mrades.

      Dracona was getting furious, and so was Gangon.

      "Sorr=
y Gangon, I did all I could, maybe BrightBlade will still show up anyway." =
Dracona said. Gangon waited while Dracona flew away.

      "Hey! Wait! You=
 forgot to untie meeeee!" Gangon screamed.

      Dracona didn't hear and l=
anded next to the People's Group members. The Radicons, Plintissa, Dracona,=
 and Artist all entered the Poeple's base through the secret passage way, t=
he computer reconizing them as friends. Train Wreck and Airbomber stepped i=
nto a door.

      "Hey, Stranato, look at this! It's amazing!" Train Wreck=
 called out. Arrow steps out of the CR Chamber all healed up.

      "Yeah,=
 it's got lots of beer and cigars in here, too! and it's big enough to put =
a table in to play cards! How come we never noticed this room before?" Airb=
omber said. Stranato walked into the room. Stronghold and Blender followed.=


      "Wait up guys!" Arrow called out, running into the room. Plintissa =
sealed the door magnetically upon order from Train Wreck, the Radicons were=
 locked inside the room to sort out their problems. There was alot of bangi=
ng, but it eventually stopped. Alot of name calling, too. Plintissa laughed=
 and sat down at a table to play cards with Dracona.

      "Oh, man! Not e=
ven a drop of beer in here! We'll dehydrate drinking water!" Stronghold sai=
d.

      "What are we going to do? Nothing to smoke!" Blender said.

     =
 "I have more needs than all of you idiots put together! I'm getting fat an=
d need to exercise!" Stranato yelled.

      "How come we can't all get alo=
ng! I don't like it in here neither!" Arrow said. Stranato looked at him li=
ke he was going to kill him. Arrow cowered in the corner.

      "You see? =
That's why you fail, Arrow, you don't stand up against Stranato and his stu=
pid rules! This was our idea!" Train Wreck yelled.

      "Yeah, and nobody=
 is getting out of here until we are all friends again." Airbomber said.

 =
     Stranato sighed in disapointment. Arrow stood up again, and started pa=
cing the room. Stronghold and Blender started to look in cracks in the wall=
 for something to drink, despite plenty of water in this room. Train Wreck =
was discussing something with Arrow and Airbomber, and Stronghold and Blend=
er joined them before long.

      "Say, you guys, it's really lonely sitti=
ng here with nothing to do, and--"

      "Shut up and get your ass over he=
re! Of course you can join us!" Arrow said, cutting off Stranato. Stranato =
walks over and sits with them. Stronghold pulls out a pack of playing cards=
.

      Plintissa and Dracona smile to each other and walk up and out of t=
he secret passgeway, taking a walk across a field...
